member.param: The triangles first points x value.
The triangles first points y value.
The triangles second points x value.
The triangles second points y value.
The triangles third points x value.
The triangles third points y value.

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.Center
member.summary: The average of the triangles positions.

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.SideLengths
member.summary: The side lengths are given as a = sqrt((cx - bx)^2 + (cy - by)^2) -- side BC opposite of A b = sqrt((cx - ax)^2 + (cy - ay)^2) -- side CA opposite of B c = sqrt((ax - bx)^2 + (ay - by)^2) -- side AB opposite of C

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.Angles
member.summary: The side lengths are given as ang_a = acos((b^2 + c^2 - a^2) / (2 * b * c)) -- angle at A ang_b = acos((c^2 + a^2 - b^2) / (2 * c * a)) -- angle at B ang_c = acos((a^2 + b^2 - c^2) / (2 * a * b)) -- angle at C

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.SemiPerimeter
member.summary: The semiperimeter is given as s = (a + b + c) / 2

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.InRadius
member.summary: The inradius is given as r = D / s This is the radius of the largest circle that can fit within the triangle. Not the same as the circum circles radius.

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.CircumRadius
member.summary: The circumradius is given as R = a * b * c / (4 * D)

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.CircumCircle
member.summary: The circum circle formed by the triangles points.

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.Altitudes
member.summary: The altitudes are given as alt_a = 2 * D / a -- altitude above side a alt_b = 2 * D / b -- altitude above side b alt_c = 2 * D / c -- altitude above side c

member.name: P:CGALDotNetGeometry.Shapes.Triangle2d.AspectRatio
member.summary: The aspect ratio may be given as the ratio of the longest to the shortest edge or, more commonly as the ratio of the circumradius to twice the inradius ar = R / (2 * r) = a * b * c / (8 * (s - a) * (s - b) * (s - c)) = a * b * c / ((b + c - a) * (c + a - b) * (a + b - c))
